original: Jeppsson, Herman Eugen, stadsläkare, Halmstad, f. 10/2/88 i S. Salle-rup, Malmöh. 1., ,av Sven J. o. Carolina Håkansson. G. 17 m. Ingeborg Bæckström. Barn: Cally f. 18. — Mog :ex. 06, med. fil. ex. 07 o. med. kand. 10, allt i Lund, med. lic. i Sthlm 16. Andre aman. v. Seraf :las. kir. klin. 15-16, e. läk. v. Norra skånska inf:reg. o. bat:läk. v. Fik 16, und :-läk. v. Hälsingborgs las. 16-17, v. Halmstads las. 17-19, e. läk. v. Hall. reg. 17, bat:läk. där 17-21, tf. andre stadsläk. i Halmstad 19-21, andre stadsliäk. där 21-33’ o. stadsiliäk. där sied. 33, e. und:läk. v. epid:sjukh. i Sthhn 27, läk. v. icpid:sjukh. i Halmstad! se’d. 3)2. Led. av stadsfulilm. 27 m. m. RVO.
translated: Jeppsson, Herman Eugen, municipal physician, Halmstad, b. February 10, 1888 in S. Salle-rup, Malmöh. 1st child of Sven J. and Carolina Håkansson. Married on the 17th of [unknown month] with Ingeborg Bæckström. Children: Cally b. 1918. Earned the degree of Doctor of Medicine in 1906, Master of Philosophy in Medicine in 1907, and Bachelor of Medicine in 1910, all in Lund. Received a Medical License in Stockholm in 1916. Assistant at the Seraf:las. Surgical Clinic from 1915-1916, military doctor at the Norra skånska infantry regiment and battalion doctor at Fik from 1916. Assistant physician at Hälsingborgs hospital from 1916-1917, at Halmstad hospital from 1917-1919. Assistant physician in Hall. regiment in 1917, battalion doctor there from 1917-1921. Acting municipal physician in Halmstad from 1919-1921, assistant municipal physician there from 1921-1933, and municipal physician from 1933. Assistant physician at the epidemic hospital in Stockholm in 1927, and physician at the epidemic hospital in Halmstad since 1932. Member of the city council from 1927 and more. Holds the Order of the Royal Vasa.

structured.name: Herman Eugen Jeppsson
structured.description: Herman Eugen Jeppsson was a Swedish doctor and municipal physician based in Halmstad. He was born on February 10, 1888, in S. Salle-rup, Malmöh, Sweden. His parents were Sven J. and Carolina Håkansson. Ingeborg Bæckström was his spouse, and they had a daughter named Cally, born in 1918. Jeppsson earned his Doctor of Medicine degree in 1906, Master of Philosophy in Medicine in 1907, and Bachelor of Medicine in 1910, all from Lund University. He obtained a Medical License in Stockholm in 1916. Throughout his career, Jeppsson served in various medical positions, including as assistant physician, military doctor, and municipal physician in Halmstad. He was also an assistant physician at epidemic hospitals in Stockholm and Halmstad. Jeppsson was a member of the Halmstad City Council and received the Order of the Royal Vasa.
